regen.absent_element: reverting mechanism for items that have been moved
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a functionality to revert items to their original location after they have been transferred.

regen.absent_element: confirmation or validation of item transfer
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate and confirm the successful transfer of items to the new location before updating the records.
The system shall provide a function to revert transferred items back to their original location, including updating records and handling any discrepancies.

label: Utility provides means to revert items to original location after a set period of time
absence: ability of reverting items to original location
